title: Bonus Episode - The Great Update
content:encoded:
Susan, Colin and Rabia update listeners on every case and story they've covered since Undisclosed began.

This episode was sponsored by ZipRecruiter, Stamps.com and Policy Genius.

Special offer that includes a 4 week trial + postage + a digital scale by going to www.stamps.com and clicking on the microphone at the top of the homepage and type in Undisclosed.

Listeners can post jobs on ZipRecruiter for FREE. Just go to www.ziprecruiter.com/undisclosed to get started.

Save up to 40% just by comparing insurance policies. The quotes are free. Go to www.policygenius.com. It’s life insurance for the 21st century.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon, Blue Dot Sessions
